writer.name: 莎拉·弗朗西斯 Sarah Francis

introduction: Aida, a 47-year-old woman living in Beirut, learns that Walid, her husband who lives and works abroad, is secretly returning to his empty family house in the mountains. Taken aback, she decides to surprise him there. Temporarily reunited in that space, they both hide things from each other and face the dysfunctional status of their relationship. A narrator punctuates the depiction of these four days as if describing an archive found in the character’s belongings.
